JobFullDesc: 343 Industries is looking for an FX Artist to join our team working on the latest blockbuster of our legendary franchise, Halo Infinite. We are looking for someone who is driven, highly creative and willing to tackle any FX challenge that comes their way. This person will need a keen critical eye to create FX that complement the legendary legacy of the Halo experience.  A solid team player with strong communication skills, who can collaborate with multiple disciplines and someone who is self-sufficient and flexible enough to build FX with minimal direction or visual targets. Be a part of a tightly knit team that is responsible for delivering high-end effects. Join 343 Industries and become part of the Halo team!     ResponsibilitiesWork with the FX Senior Artist to ensure the visual quality bar is met. Create all types of photorealistic, high quality effects for weapons, vehicles and characters.Innovate current effect techniques to push beyond modern game development methods.Concept and prototype new effects as well as raising the quality bar on existing content. Collaborate with other FX artists to share techniques, assets and ideas. Optimize effects to run efficiently within the game while maintaining high quality standards. Be self-driven and passionate about effects development. QualificationsRequired Experience and Skillset:  Art-related degree and/or comparable professional experience. 1+ years’ experience working in a real-time game engine.  Preferred Experience and skillset:  Strong understanding of how to create photorealistic effects. Strong knowledge of particle systems.   Experience working with real-time particle simulations in either proprietary or 3rd party systems. Knowledge of art fundamentals including color theory, visual design, and composition.Solid understanding of physics, motion and animation, including weighting, scale and timing. Solid understanding of animation and timing and how to apply this effectively to gameplay FXExperience managing real-time FX to GPU/CPU budgets including performance profiling and LOD workGood understanding of Lighting and how it influences effects. Strong communication skills.  Experienced at mentoring and reviewing work of junior artists.Shipped at least one AAA game, block buster film or popular TV series. Experience writing shaders either through an engine’s node network or within a text editor. Understanding of compositing and rendering techniques.Proficient in at least one 3D software package like Maya, Max, Houdini or XSI. Experience creating high quality fluid dynamic systems. Proficient in Photoshop. #GamingJobs
